synthesis_conditions.yield: 99% for cycloaddition of CO2 and aziridines
synthesis_conditions.comments: Exhibits excellent catalytic performance in the cycloaddition of CO2 with aziridines but only 32% efficiency in the carboxylation cyclization of CO2 with propargyl amines due to the absence of Lewis base sites.

synthesis_conditions.yield: 2.4 times higher than 1 for the carboxylation cyclization of CO2 with propargyl amines
synthesis_conditions.comments: The introduction of XN decreases the Lewis acid sites and increases the Lewis base sites, improving catalytic efficiency for carboxylation cyclization of CO2 with propargyl amines.

chemicals_used.name: acid
chemicals_used.role: to remove part of the XN ligand

synthesis_conditions.yield: 99% for cycloaddition of CO2 with aziridines by 2-PST-120
synthesis_conditions.comments: The acid treatment exposes more Lewis acid sites, enhancing the catalytic effect for the cycloaddition of CO2 with aziridines. The yield decreases for carboxylation cyclization of CO2 with propargyl amines as Lewis base sites are reduced.
